values:
So I got bored....I started seeing other journals. But none of them compare to you baby, you know just the way I like it. Posted. Ahhhh yeaaah. Here are some corny valentine cards, created to melt your heart like grilled cheese.
Forgive me?
http://dabbledoodle.livejournal.com/3307.html

Just another christmas card image. I'm putting them together tonight!! Hurrah!!!
Marker and ink on copy
http://dabbledoodle.livejournal.com/2890.html

I don't know what it is, but I can't seem to 'WANT' to fall asleep until early, early in the morning. If I was back in Oakville, there would be birds singing outside my window right now, but since its the city and there are no trees near my window...only the low rumble of a streetcar echos down my street. I came home from work tonight and decided to watch Sex and the City. And wanting to be productive, I drew my most favorite grey kitty ever. Binx.
pencil and pencil crayon on copy
http://dabbledoodle.livejournal.com/2806.html

I spent soooo much time colouring this guy. There had to be an easier way then how I coloured it, but meh, at least it looks good. I'll post the rest of my christmas card stuff when it gets completed.
Before and the completed result
http://dabbledoodle.livejournal.com/2463.html

Actually, I don't know if it or not. I haven't ventured outside yet. In fact, I haven't even showered yet. I feel dirty. Not Christina Aguilera dirty, just sort of grubby. I had this case of sickness that lasted five hours. It tore my throat apart and took away my voice. It made me sleep until 3:30 in the afternoon yesterday. Of course, I now feel fine. Hurrah! I'm putting a couple sketches today since I didn't post yesterday.
Pencil on copy Orignal sketches for my third year film
http://dabbledoodle.livejournal.com/2297.html

A looooooong time ago, I had an idea for a comic. A comic involving a witch. It never panned out. Heres a concept drawing I had done up. I started colouring it up before work and I just finished a couple minutes ago. OOoooohhhhh....witchy woman....
Some Red col-erase, Ink and photoshop
http://dabbledoodle.livejournal.com/1976.html

Fuck you internet for being so frustratingily slow. I really don't know what Bells problem is. Die. Maybe she can whip them into shape.
Pencil and coloured in photoshop
For the record, I should probably reboot.
http://dabbledoodle.livejournal.com/1542.html

Heres a drawing I sketched up at the Royal Winter fair. Its fun drawing sheep with personalities.
Pastel on good paper
http://dabbledoodle.livejournal.com/1350.html

As I sat watching tv, I suddenly noticed it was two. I was busy drawing, so atleast I'm being productive. Just some sketches I'll colour up later this week.
pencil on copy She has the looooongest body ever, but hey, it works.
Yes. I did it. I started and finished watching Dukes of Hazzard. I might have lost some brain cells and good common sense, but out of it, a couple doodles.
A hillbilly. They made a big deal of it in the movie. So I drew one. Yeehaw Hey look, its my version of Daisy Duke, Double D herself. I've noticed it needs to be leveled out abit, but otherwise....did I get the breasts right?
http://dabbledoodle.livejournal.com/1268.html

This one was all the rage at Comic Book con. Perhaps I have a feel for robots...I mean, everyone loves robots right?
pencil on copy paper, coloured in Photoshop
http://dabbledoodle.livejournal.com/900.html
Ahhh, christmas songs. Its offically December so I can listen to them as much as I want. In the spirit of season..or of snow, here is todays image! Its an oldie, but it fits, so enjoy!
http://dabbledoodle.livejournal.com/657.html

So I'm digging through what I currently have on my computer (I'm too lazy to scan something current in tonight) and to-da! I found this picture I had done for my mom for letting me crash at her place for a month. Its of her ugly cat, the cat taht always looked angry. It was the ugliness that made it somewhat cute and fasinating to draw.
Marker and pen on copy paper
http://dabbledoodle.livejournal.com/319.html
